components.name: 1-propylpyridinium bis((trifluoromethyl)sulfonyl)amide
sample: 98 mass %;0.005 water mass %;0.002 halide impurity mass %(dried by vacuum heating;solvent extraction)

title: Refraction, surface tension, and speed of sound: Refractive index (Na D-line)

ref.title: Comparative study of effect of alkyl chain length on thermophysical characteristics of five N-alkylpyridinium bis(trifluoromethylsulfonyl)imides with selected imidazolium-based ionic liquids
ref.full: Dzida, M.; Musial, M.; Zorebski, E.; Zorebski, M.; Jacquemin, J.; Goodrich, P.; Wojnarowska, Z.; Paluch, M. (2019) J. Mol. Liq. 278, 401-412.
